duties_responsibilities.duty: Source and identify qualified candidates for various healthcare positions using a range of recruitment tools and platforms.
Screen and assess candidates to ensure they meet the requirements and culture fit for the healthcare positions.
Manage client relationships, understanding their hiring needs, and providing consultative talent acquisition solutions.
Utilize social media and other innovative methods to attract and engage passive candidates in the healthcare industry.
Collaborate with internal teams and leaders to optimize recruitment processes and strategies.
Provide coaching and support to hiring managers and team members throughout the recruitment process.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 2-years of experience working in either Recruitment, Human Resources, or in the Healthcare Industry (in any type of role)
